title: Bartel on Journey to Mali - claim on significance

content.question: Which of the following claims best summarizes the significance of the pilgrimage described in the excerpt?

choices.label: The display of wealth encouraged merchants to seek out trading opportunities with the Mali Empire.
The visit to Egypt led to its conquest and the inclusion of Northeast Africa in the Sudanic empires.
The pilgrimage caused the trade routes to immediately shift from the Sahara Desert to the Atlantic Ocean.
The pilgrimage marked the fall of the Empire of Ghana and the rise of the Mali Empire.

content.answer: The display of wealth encouraged merchants to seek out trading opportunities with the Mali Empire.
